wikipedia_page.main:
Anthony James de Rothschild (born 30 January 1977) is a British businessman, philanthropist and a member of the Rothschild banking family of England.
He is the eldest son of Sir Evelyn Robert de Rothschild by his second wife, American-born Victoria Lou Schott (1949- 21 January 2021), daughter of Marcia Lou Whitney and Lewis M. Schott.He is married to Danish model and UK TV presenter Tania Strecker.

response: * Anthony James de Rothschild (b. 1977), British businessman, son of Evelyn Robert de Rothschild
